cause.description:
Despite an ongoing search, the honourable Canadian Goose is still missing. All the evidence points towards a "stab in the back" from the facebook gestapo - a despicable act since the Goose was responsible for advertisting the site during its migratory travels.
BUT - it will not stop there - today a goose - tomorrow a sheep.. what next.... culling the homeless?!!!
1. All facebook animals are sacred
2. Facebook celebrities must be protected by constitutional amendment
3. All clowns must be eradicated - especially Ronald McDonald
cause.mission: Save facebook animals from despicable nazi hordes
cause.name: Bring back Canadian Goose and safeguard all facebook animals
